Name: Pumpkin head
About the game: This game is a side-scrolling 2D action shooting game created with dot pictures. Control the main character, Pumpkin Head, as he runs through various stages such as the sea and the desert while battling the slime army! Use three different types of shots to get the better of your adventure! To make the game easier to play, functions for auto-save and time attack have been implemented. Once you clear a stage, challenge Time Attack! Break the staff record and win the crown! Please refer to the URL in the online manual for the terms and conditions when submitting gameplay videos.
